knimeNode.name: ActMolecule from Molecule
knimeNode.shortDescription: Generates an Actelion molecule column from a molecule string representation (SDF or Mol File) and appends it to the table.

fullDescription.intro: Generates an Actelion molecule column from a molecule string representation (SDF or Mol File) and appends it to the table.
fullDescription.option: The column containing the string representation of the molecules
The name of the column with the converted Actelion molecule
If checked, the input column will be replaced by the new column

ports.inPort: Input table containing the string representation of molecules in one column
ports.outPort: Table containing the converted Actelion molecules in an added column
